description: DiskSettings describe ephemeral disk settings for the os disk.

ephemeralStorageLocation.description: EphemeralStorageLocation enables ephemeral OS when set to 'Local'. Possible values include: 'Local'. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/ephemeral-os-disks for full details. Empty value means no opinion and the platform chooses a default, which is subject to change over time. Currently the default is that disks are saved to remote Azure storage.
